description:
Average cifti files.

Averages cifti files together.  Files without -weight specified are given a weight of 1.  If -exclude-outliers is specified, at each element, the data across all files is taken as a set, its unweighted mean and sample standard deviation are found, and values outside the specified number of standard deviations are excluded from the (potentially weighted) average at that element.

sigma_below.title: sigma_below
sigma_below.description: number of standard deviations below the mean to include

sigma_above.title: sigma_above
sigma_above.description: number of standard deviations above the mean to include

anyOf.description: exclude outliers by standard deviation of each element across files

exclude_outliers.description: exclude outliers by standard deviation of each element across files

opt_mem_limit_limit_gb.title: opt_mem_limit_limit_gb
opt_mem_limit_limit_gb.description: restrict memory used for file reading efficiency: memory limit in gigabytes

opt_weight_weight.title: opt_weight_weight
opt_weight_weight.description: give a weight for this file: the weight to use
